website_summaries.verdict: Certified organic cacao product that gives you a great taste and texture.
pros: Contains theobromine, which offers the alertness and energy of caffeine without the downside
Contains high levels of iron, magnesium, and fiber
Product matches criteria to meet organic, kosher, and vegan standards
cons: Cost is a little more per ounce than some other cacao powder products

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to add into smoothies and oatmeal's as a low calorie add in thinking that it would be 30 calories for 2 tbsp as advertised. Today the powder came in and it says 120 calories for 1 ounce. 4 times as much calories than advertised. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cacao of the gods.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, rich flavor. My mother is a cacao connoisseur and having tried dozens of brands, even some I've picked up in the Caribbean directly from the farm, she likes this the best and I am inclined to agree.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I gained weight taking this!
customer_reviews.text: After using this I started to notice that my clothes were getting tighter. This stuff is full of carbs and calories. I gained 5 lbs in 3 weeks. The flavor is pretty bland. Also, it comes in a ridiculous thin cardboard container that is hard to close. I do not recommend this. I'm pretty upset the calories are so much higher than was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ThatPainterChick

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: I use this for many baking goods as well as a cup of hot chocolate on a chilly day. I really enjoy the flavor and it enriches the baked goods when using in certain recipes - especially in brownies. A little goes a long way. I use a half of tablespoon when mixing in a cup of almond milk. Warm the milk first prior to putting the cacao powder in - it mixes better. enJOY
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Luv, luv this product! Thank you Amazon for listing it, now I do not to "find it" hit or miss at other stores. Wish it came in dark too. I add a heaping teaspoon on top of a container of vanilla Greek yogurt lite in the morning...by lunch..it is the most rich chocolate desert, alone or with fruit! Who needs the far? This is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: N. Meli

customer_reviews.title: Only cocao I'll use!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this product originally at TJMaxx, but can't get it there now. Just as easy to order with Prime and have it shipped for free! This is a very smooth tasting cacao powder. I don't use any other cocoa powder anymore as the OMG! brand has me spoiled!
customer_reviews.author: S. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Delicious cacao powder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other cacao powders but OMG’s is by far the best tasting! It’s delicious and super healthy! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: kaa

customer_reviews.title: Rich, smooth and chocolatey!!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious!! Very rich smooth chocolate flavor. Blends easily into recipes without separating.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl in Ct

customer_reviews.title: Calorie content is 120 not 30 as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that the calorie content is 120 instead of the advertised 30 calories. The nutrition label should accurately display what is in the product, and what people will receive. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele

customer_reviews.title: Formerly great product changed for the worse
customer_reviews.text: I got this cocoa many times before and loved it. It had a smooth flavor and mixed with milk, it made great hot cocoa. I have a recurring order for it. The new containers have new packaging - a pull off foil instead of a plastic wrap seal. Both containers have some kind of gritty sediment in them that won't dissolve and sticks in my throat. It collects at the bottom of the cup and sits there. It looks and tastes like dirt. Is it a new product? Terrible. Undrinkable.
customer_reviews.author: William W Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: No Bitter Taste
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but this cocao powder does not taste bitter as all the other either dark chocolate or cacao that i have tried does. Also does not give me a headache like dark chocolate does, maybe this isn't dark chocolate but still it would have more cacao than sugar so you'd think it would but it's nice, when i first got it didn't have any sweetener so just had a glass of hemp milk warmed up a bit with a tsp of OMG and it was tasty but of course now that i have honey it tastes even better. I'm also a big fan of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: OpheliaSpark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for smoothies!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite product! I bought this powder to use one teaspoon in my daily smoothie, and boy does it taste good! Makes it flavorful (I also use vanilla protein powder, a little beet powder, powdered peanut butter, a frozen banana, and frozen mango or fresh berries.) You could use this powder in plain yogurt, baking, etc. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: VeryGood --BUT
customer_reviews.text: They were sold out of the 16 oz bag... So I ordered what was available for a daily smoothie...the 8 oz can...I ordered 3 cans and the protective plastic covering on one was ripped leaving some cocoa in lid...maybe they will replace this one. The 16 oz bag is excellent & at a better price...so I hope this will be available soon.
customer_reviews.author: M.Ski

customer_reviews.title: So it’s good for like a cheat day or to make fat ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I’m on the keto diet. But it does have way too many carbs. So it’s good for like a cheat day or to make fat bombs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cacao I have tried for a reasonable price. I tried few brands, expensive and cheaper. I decided to try this one because it was cheaper than another brand I used to buy, and flavor is amazing. I make chocolate and use it in shakes. Great flavor and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Lizaveta

customer_reviews.title: Bad product container
customer_reviews.text: Freshness is questionable coz when i received my 1st order it has small openings most probably from handling & delivery. The container for this good tasting product is just a cardboard box that cud easily be damaged when placed inside a mailing envelope w/o anything more to protect it from being damaged from transport. And yes i still need to transfer the contents in a sealed container to protect whats left of its freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trust me don't hesitate to buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I live in a retirement unit with 48 apartments. we have all kinds of bring a tree meet you downstairs let's have lunch here. I tried to tell them anything they could do or use for chocolate icing flavoring whipping cream, cookies etc. This is a wonderful product. Reasonably priced. I'm on a social security budget but as soon as I can afford it everybody's getting it for Christmas. Do not hesitate to buy this product
customer_reviews.author: KAREN STEVENS

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: I've never used this product before and was more than happy with how my vegan chocolate chip cookies turned out. My granddaughter said they were better than the usual recipe I've been using for 40 years!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Really Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This product really tastes good! And, it mixes so well when making smoothies, etc. I'm extremely pleased with this product and have experienced no negative issues--will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: It comes in an easy to use container and has a wonderful chocolate flavor. I like to put a little in my coffee from time to time. I also made chocolate hummus with it and it was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Tummy pain.
customer_reviews.text: i was drink this products after minutes tummy very harts. i can not use anymore.
customer_reviews.author: yuki shibata-doxey

customer_reviews.title: Sweet tooth
customer_reviews.text: Best cacao I've ever had the pleasure of using. This is authentic and I love compared it to the other products I've bought and researched and for some reason this hits different, in a better way. Not to mention it's fair trade and I back that up 100%
customer_reviews.author: Juice boi

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate .I bought this mainly to add to my oatmeal and baking . As a lot of people trying to eat healthier. This has really good flavor, It came sealed and packaged well. I would definitely buy again. I don’t like buying in bulk because I cook only for me, this is a nice size food I me .Good buy for me
customer_reviews.author: susan johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very good cocoa
customer_reviews.text: This is good cocoa. I like the packaging which is better than plastic and appears to be recyclable or biodegradable anyway. I wish the cost were just a little bit less.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Cacao
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful powder. Two scoops was all I needed for a container of chocolate smoothie. If u cut it with a little salt you cannot taste the bitterness at all. I made a banana, hazelnut smoothie with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanda Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Used to like - now it tastes horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I got a bad batch but this is gritty, very clumpy and tastes very bad. I used to love this stuff. Not sure if I will try again ever.
customer_reviews.author: Cynicalman

customer_reviews.title: IT IS JUST O.K.
customer_reviews.text: It is just O.K. Not a very strong chocolatey taste. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Protein Shake Additive
customer_reviews.text: It tastes Really good in my protein shake 👍 preferably used w/ ON Gold Standard’s Vanilla protein powder & ice 👍Great Combo
customer_reviews.author: Steve King

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: OMG this stuff rocks for all keto deserts a must have
customer_reviews.author: ronald

customer_reviews.title: great for cooking and sprinkling
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle this on yogurt ( with a touch of sugar). It makes yogurt more interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Health Benefits...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this for the positive health benefits ...I was pleasantly surprised at how good it tasted, plus the fact that it easily dissolved in my coffee, this is much better than any other cocoa products, I will be ordering this again...
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great Cacao!
customer_reviews.text: I try to only buy this cacao because it's the best that I've tried!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Roszak

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much -- good value too.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! Superfood Cacao.. I love this cacao powder. It has a deliciously rich taste. It blends smoothly in my protein shakes and hot cacao too.. Yummm!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele zar

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with OMG
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only used the OMG in my morning cups of coffee and am very happy with it. Love the flavor and the fact that it is organic and nutritious. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. It’s great for smoothies and homemade popsicles. Not sweet at all, I use honey to sweeten.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The Cacao tastes great. I love to make hot chocolate with it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: OMG...good!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavor. I use this cacao in smoothies and vegan desserts. Price is less than that big health food store and delivered right to your door.

customer_reviews.title: Great for addition to morning coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my morning coffee. It is simply wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Natural no fillers.
customer_reviews.text: For breakfast, I like it’s plain no added ingredients to it , but it also missing the natural fat that’s come in Cacao , have to add a drop of coconut oil to it since I drink it without milk .
customer_reviews.author: Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Rich smooth taste
customer_reviews.text: I love that it doesn’t have the bitter taste that some cocao has. I had some in my smoothie this morning. It was wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This cacao taste so fresh and delectable. I add it to my smoothies and to my yogurt. It's so yummy I add it to my Coffee in the morning as well.
customer_reviews.author: vickymc

customer_reviews.title: By far the best
customer_reviews.text: A cup of cocoa in the morning is my "cup of coffee". I've tried several other brands of unsweetened cocoa, and this one is by far the best. I'm coming back for more!
customer_reviews.author: T Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cacao!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried quite a few other brands. I always come back to OMG. I really love this brand. Perfect in vanilla protein shakes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stealurbike

customer_reviews.title: Taste is the most important thing it doesn't bring it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered to see if it tastes as good as cocoa bliss because cocoa is so expensive. Sad to say it tastes awful and no where near as good as cocoa bliss. I might can use it in baking but not drinking in my hot chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Nk

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Saw many good reviews so I bought it. But I guess this isn’t for me. The powder is bland to me even if I add sugar or milk. It wasn’t the taste that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Binh N.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Exactly as advertised! Great price! Quick delivery. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: carrie singleton

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great! Small container.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great! Small container though- I was picturing larger... my goof though not theirs.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: has a rich chocolate taste without the sweet. love that it can be used for baking .
customer_reviews.author: Donna T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality , really good brand. Taste great. Nice packaging, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B. C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for baking, but since I use it as a drink, the taste it’s not as I was expected
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & Delicious.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my morning shakes & it’s just enough “healthy chocolate” to make it perfect. I use to buy the bits, but purchased the powder by mistake. It’s easier to blend as powder.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Neavitt

customer_reviews.title: This cacao has a deep chocolate flavor that enhances any ...
customer_reviews.text: This cacao has a deep chocolate flavor that enhances any recipe you use it in. I use it for baking and in smoothies and it never disappoints!
customer_reviews.author: Florina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this..I mix it with a little swerve and put it on my oatbran
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: Came super fast, less than 24 hours. Not bitter at all and smooth. I add it to my caramel nut dandelion tea and its amazing. Very little goes a long way! I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the card board container it came in. the top was torn and slightly crushed. I want a more secure package.I don't think I will be ordering this brand again

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make keto fat bombs. It was perfect

customer_reviews.title: OMG!  I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cacao powder use it every morning in my bullet coffee, will definitely purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, excellent quality, delicious taste
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, excellent quality, delicious taste, we use it every day in my Keto/Bulletproof coffee with my team in the mornings, and everyone loves the flavor. We also add some Stevia drops, and it's delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Creamy goodness
customer_reviews.text: Great cacoa. Extra smoothe and so tasty you would not dream of adding sugar to it!

customer_reviews.text: I do loooove chocolate but also my health, this was the best solution

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality cacao at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality cacao at a very good price...exactly what I needed for my recipes. I will be a repeat customer.

customer_reviews.title: Taste wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful , been using it every day since I got it , just wished it was a little cheaper , but the quality is great

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have tried other cacao nibs and this is one of my favorites.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I put it in my coffee every day, has a wonderful flavor with out being tart.

customer_reviews.title: Cacao is good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a burnt roosted after taste. Cacao is too light need to add more scoops unlike other brands.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Seal/open
customer_reviews.text: Received with a broken seal and cacao all over box. Will ask to be replaced.

customer_reviews.title: ... to order so I tried this one and it's amazing, must try it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know which cacao powder to order so I tried this one and it's amazing, must try it!

customer_reviews.title: Good for my wellness
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I used it in my smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Eva RobertoLitz

customer_reviews.title: Mix it with Pudding or Yogurt!
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with Greek yogurt or chocolate pudding and it covers up the bitter taste. You can also add honey or something else to the mix--I add stevia-and really like it. It gives me a boost and seems to help my thyroid function a bit also.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria'sLoft

customer_reviews.title: the product is the excellent quality exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in time, the product is the excellent quality exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mix with coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Great mix with coffee! The container is plastic foil sealed, nothing leaks in shipment, very fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I made the tastiest chocolate treats with almond butter and dates.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Cacao is the cat's meow!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!! Organic, responsibly grown and processed, no GMOs, and validated as such by third party organizations. This high-grade cacao powder should not be confused with cocoa powder. It has a richer flavor so a one-to-one substitute for cocoa powder may not work out for every recipe. It is well worth the money. I will be buying it again and again and again. I specifically use it in my Better than Bullet Proof Coffee every morning. There are more antioxidants in this than there are in blueberries. It's a great way to start the day.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great health benefits to adding this to my morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I read that it offers great health benefits by adding it to my morning coffee (and not adding any milk or sugar). I do miss my milk, but the chocolate makes it a little better than drinking black coffee. It is important to add it to hot coffee (or add the hot coffee to the cup with the tablespoon of cacao in the bottom) or it won't mix. Originally I rated it with 4 stars because I have trouble getting the lid on and off. But I figured out that if you twist it on and off, the lid is easy to take on and off. So I have updated this to be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: FJLTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Check your labels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to it being low in carbs, on the nutrition label on the physical label of the cacao powder has an entire different carb count. Higher in fact, kind of disappoint and not worth the hassle of returning. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered but...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered powder and got the nibs. I decided to keep them and try the nibs anyway. So i can't really give review on the powder but the nibs smell like dark chocolate and they have nutty flavor. Wish i had gotten the powder. Not sure I'll reorder, who knows what I'll get next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: ... use this product in a smoothie every day and love it! This company makes great products maranga and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in a smoothie every day and love it! This company makes great products maranga and tumeric are great too, easy to blend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lynn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mm good
customer_reviews.text: Best cacao ever, this is the only brand I use. Don't hesitate to tried this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pepter

customer_reviews.title: Delish & less refined!
customer_reviews.text: This is DELISH! Not (or less) processed than your average cocoa, which leaves chemicals in it, btw. This tastes sweeter & *sometimes* seems to have a bit of a nutty flavor. I’m working on a healthy lifestyle in every which way I can & this fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Irish Shrink

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with mixing cacao powder into my smoothies and the consistency on this one is great and it has a great rich taste. And I love the packaging because I'm a sucker for good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Organic Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is an organic high quality product with a great flavor! ❤️ I’ll be buying again! Love a spoonful in my coffee too. That leads to my 6 year old wanting a sip of my coffee. ☕️
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Todd

customer_reviews.title: Calorie count .
customer_reviews.text: Tastes wonderful & rich. My complaint is the date received was after the date of expiration. Next, I don't like the idea of advertising a porduct at a lower calorie count than the actual package reads: 130 calories for 1 oz. The taste is superb & packaging is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A. Little

customer_reviews.title: best cocoa dissolves really well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cocoa to cook with because it is organic and cheaper than others. I was surprised at how flavorful it is and how well it blends in my morning mocha. I've used other cocoa powder that wouldn't dissolve or had a bitter after taste. This will be my go to from now on
customer_reviews.author: dragonflydays

customer_reviews.title: Thats freaking good! Huge shout out to the customer service, you guys are wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow!!! I had a small issue with my package and these people were instant at fixing it. Id say pretty high quality customer service! And the product is just what i was craving. It gets me thru those...times.
customer_reviews.author: Jinglenuts

customer_reviews.title: ripped
customer_reviews.text: I received the cacao product but the bag has a tear in it and there was cacao all over the package it was in and went all over when I took it out. I ended up with less than half of the product after I cleaned up the mess.
customer_reviews.author: mary j. markle

customer_reviews.title: I’m A FAN...
customer_reviews.text: Good value and fast shipping, GREAT product with GREAT flavor! I enjoy a little Cacao flavored coffee every morning, aside from the tasty baked goods it goes into 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Jane O

customer_reviews.title: cacao instead of cocoa
customer_reviews.text: I will probably never go back to cocoa again- this cacao is amazing. Not loaded down with sugar- I even put it in my oatmeal for breakfast- and about 3 in the afternoon -I fix a cup of hot Cacao - the energy is really good for this 74 year old lady!

customer_reviews.title: Not a terrible replacement for cocoa
customer_reviews.text: Definitely tastes like unsweetened bitter chocolate powder. A pretty good amount for the price. Mixes pretty well with protein shakes.

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great taste and texture. Perfect for smoothies and homemade granola bars. Love this product and seller!

customer_reviews.title: tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over four months and it is great in my morning coffee, I plan to keep ordering it.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great taste overall. Some Cacao Powders I have tried are a lot more bitter tasting. This is quite good. I really like it my coffee in the morning. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: My sisters and I have dairy allergies (and I have other health concerns around dairy) so this is such a treat. We made the best hit chocolate with almond milk!

customer_reviews.title: I love the cacao
customer_reviews.text: I love the cacao. I have stomach issues and it seems to agree with me and also like the flavor. My only complaint is when I went to order more for my son it isn’t available. Hoping there will be more!!

customer_reviews.text: This cacao powder has a very good flavor, not nearly as bitter as other brands.

customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and it's safe. I also like the packaging, no plastic!!

customer_reviews.title: Great tasty cocoa!
customer_reviews.text: I use in morning coffee! I find it helpful and enjoyable!

customer_reviews.title: Omg! Organic Superfood Organic Cacao Powder
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement. I love the taste of the powder helps me with cravings for chocolate and makes me feel good too. Can't ask for more than that!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Yum! Dont use too much at once
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I put almond milk, a crop of vanilla protein powder and tablespoon of this in a blender for a yummy healthy smoothie that tastes like a vanilla malted ice cream shake. 3 points on Weight Watchers!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kirkos

product_meta.title: OMG! Superfoods Organic Cacao Powder - 100% Pure, USDA Certified Organic Cacao Powder - 8oz
feature_bullets: WHAT YOU NEED: Tired of spending your money on store-bought cacao which is not only filled with preservatives and taste enhancers, but also loses its valuable nutrients through over processing? OMG! organic cacao powder is the perfect solution!
ORGANIC & PURE: Unlike similar products on the market, this cacao powder is USDA organic certified, containing 100% pure ingredients which are sustainably grown and Earth-friendly!

INTENSE FLAVOR: Enjoy a rich, smooth flavor of finest cacao powder and use it for various delicious recipes, including smoothies, baking products, as a healthy breakfast choice, muffins, tarts and more!

IDEAL SUPERFOOD: The OMG! organic raw cacao is rich in all sorts of vitamins, minerals and essential nutrients, containing a high amount of fibers and iron which support the well-functioning of your digestion and promote an overall healthy metabolism!
PERFECT FOR EVERYONE: With a vegan friendly and kosher, this pure cacao powder is ideal for men and women of all ages, being an important part of your daily meal plan!
